long_description: With lots of stability for any skill level and plenty of room for gear, the blue Dagger Zydeco 11.0 kayak excels during day trips, gear-heavy hobbies or even an overnight trek. 11 ft. 2 in. length cruises efficiently, accelerates quickly and maneuvers responsively. Polyethylene construction offers performance, responsiveness and rugged durability. Soft foam seat features a height-adjustable backrest, leg lifters, and thigh pads in the cockpit. Roomy cockpit makes it easy for large paddlers to enter kayak, and sliding foot pegs lock in to adjust the fit for multiple paddlers. Soft knee pads attach either inside the cockpit or on the exterior, offering customizable comfort. Paddle keeper frees up hands for photography or fishing. Touring-style deck rigging offers quick access to necessities. Bulkheaded stern hatch offers dry storage for touring essentials. Carrying toggles make transport of the 48 lb. Dagger Zydeco 11.0 kayak easy and convenient.
short_description: With lots of stability for any skill level and plenty of room for gear, the blue Dagger Zydeco 11.0 kayak excels during day trips, gear-heavy hobbies or even an overnight trek.
